0.name: Red
0.description:
Leaps forward and fire consecutive shots, each shot dealing X% of physical damage.
You are immune to crowd-control and stagger during the skill animation.

Leaps forward your enemy to kick before following up with a shot, dealing X% physical damage and marking them.
When attacking marked enemy, fire an additional shot dealing Y%.

2.name: Blue
2.description:
Fires a shock bomb, dealing X% physical damage and create an energy circle.
Enemies caught within the energy circle take Y% physical damage for 3s.
This skill has limited range and will detonate if the target is out of range.

3.name: Basic
3.description: Deals a total of A% physical damage.

4.name: Ultimate

Each shot fired by this cannon deals A% physical damage.

0.description: Attacks against enemies increase their damage taken by A%

1.name: Core
1.description: After a 3 orb combo, the next blue orb will trigger a charged attack that drags in enemies while charging. Grants a shield base on 8% of maximum health for 7 seconds and take 70% less damage from all sources while charging. After fully charging, attack with a heavy strike, dealing A% physical damage.

2.name: Leader
2.description: Increase defense by 10% and attack by 5% when there are 3 different classes in the team.

3.name: Passive 1
3.description: After landing an attack against an enemy with a yellow orb, increase character's own defense and physical attack by 10%, lasts for 5 seconds.

4.name: Passive 2
4.description: Upon a successful core passive, decrease the enemy's defense by 15%.

5.name: Passive 3
5.description: After casting ultimate, increase all damage by 20% for 8 seconds.

0.name: Red
0.description: Fire an energy arrow that penetrates through enemies after charging, dealing X% physical damage. Deals lightning damage when is a 3 orb combo.

1.name: Yellow
1.description: Flash towards the sky, shooting out a charged arrow, dealing X% physical damage after 2 exploding, leaving a lightning area. Enemies within the area will be slowed by A% and receive 20/35/50% lightning damage per second. The field last 3/5/7 seconds

2.name: Blue
2.description: Snap your fingers and explode the arrow's energy, pushing back enemies around you, dealing X% physical damage. Gain l lightning charge. Normal attacks will have l extra lightning arrow, deals Y% lightning damage. Red orbs and core passive will trigger 2 additional lightning arrow, deals Z% lightning damage, last for 8 seconds

3.name: Basic
3.description: Shoots out 7 arrows. The last arrow will be a charged penetration arrow. Deal A% physical damage in total.

4.name: Ultimate
4.description: Consume 100 energy. Fire off a barrage of arrows towards the sky, trigger a chain lightning strike, each strike deals A% lightning damage within their area. After a delay, the strikes will explode, dealing B% lightning damage.

5.name: QTE
5.description: Shoots out 4 arrows, each dealing A% lightning damage

0.name: Class-specific Passive
0.description: Increase damage done by A%

1.name: Core
1.description: After a 3 red orb combo, consuming blue orbs will enter sniper mode. Basic attacks will fire off a long range penetrating lightning arrow, dealing A% lightning damage, last for 6 seconds or after sucessfully shooting 6 arrows, exit sniper mode. When dodging during sniper mode, the next basic attack will have a faster charge rate. Orbs won't be recovered using basic attack in sniper mode.

2.name: Leader
2.description: lightning damage increase to all members. Attack types gain an additional 5% attack.

3.name: Passive 1
3.description: Deal 10% more damage to enemies who got penetrated by the arrow from red orb skill, last for 8 seconds

4.name: Passive 2
4.description: Deal 15% more damage to enemies within the lightning area from yellow orb skill.
